author: hlship
msg: Heavy refactor of the Translator interface; translators are now more likely to throw an exception, allowing the enclosing Rule to capture and report it.
Added the SmartTranslator, which does a smart conversion of a string to a property value, taking into account the property type.
Remove <set-int>, <set-boolean>, and <set-long> from hivemind.BuilderFactory; the <set> element can now do this (using the smart translator).

author: hlship
msg: Remove dependency on commons-beanutils (and commons-collections, by extension).

author: hlship
msg: Rename packages from org.apache.commons.hivemind to org.apache.hivemind.
Rename service model "singleton" to "primitive", and "deferred" to "singleton".
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag

author: hlship
msg: Add new support for build the distributions and installing them to the temporary distribution directory.
